meanings.sent1: The loud noise vellicates my ears.
meanings.sent2: The constant buzzing of the fly vellicates me.
meanings.sent3: The persistent itch on my back vellicates me to scratch.

meanings.sent5: The dripping water vellicates my nerves like a never-ending drumbeat.

meanings.sent2: The muscle in my leg vellicates after a long run.
